game.name: The Champions of Lootheim
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Champions of Lootheim is an action roguelike where you face hordes of creatures to survive. Have fun defeating enemies to evolve your attributes throughout the game and buy permanent upgrades in the shop, as well as equipment dropped in chests by powerful enemies.
